name: THE BALDINA
description:
Hello dear player! School, mmmm, what do you think about this place? Are you ready for an amazing scenarios of mixed levels with Baldina? You'll have to solve many math exercises while escaping the class rooms... Look carefully for tips we prepared for you. Remember! Do not collide with other students and teachers, otherwise you will lose speed.
No one has been in school for years. Ever since that certain terrible thing happened. It's time for someone to come in and accomplish the task. Your task is to find the books, all the seven. To take a book, you need to solve 10 tests. Every test has three math examples. You can't make a mistake! You're not alone in the building. A strict, math teacher is waiting for you with a ruler in your hand. If you spoil the task, she will find and will not be merciful to you. In this exciting adventure, the place increases with the ratio of solutions and opens up for you. If you get a book, another door opens. Get in and find the next challenge!

Features:
  • Exciting tasks
  • Math practice
  • Adventurous learning
  • Creepy environment
